alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Greer; Harmon; Kiowa; Roger Mills; Washita; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Washita, southern Ellis, Roger Mills, Custer, northwestern Kiowa, Dewey, northern Harmon, Greer, Beckham and southern Woodward Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1045 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles south of Vici to 3 miles west of Butler to 3 miles southeast of Carter to near Vinson. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elk City, Clinton, Sayre, Mangum, Cordell, Shattuck, Cheyenne, Arnett, Taloga, Granite, Burns Flat, Thomas, Erick, Sentinel, Seiling, Arapaho, Vici, Hammon, Dill City and Canute. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 2 and 72. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Greer; Harmon; Kiowa; Roger Mills; Washita; Woodward
